android.car.watchdog

类 CarWatchdogManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.CarManagerBase
      • android.car.watchdog.CarWatchdogManager

  • public final class CarWatchdogManager
extends CarManagerBase
    CarWatchdogManager allows applications to collect latest system resource overuse statistics, add listener for resource overuse notifications, and update resource overuse configurations.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  CarWatchdogManager.CarWatchdogClientCallback
      CarWatchdogClientCallback is implemented by the clients which want to be health-checked by car watchdog server.
      static interface  CarWatchdogManager.MinimumStatsFlag 
      static interface  CarWatchdogManager.ResourceOveruseFlag 
      static interface  CarWatchdogManager.ResourceOveruseListener
      Listener to get resource overuse notifications.
      static interface  CarWatchdogManager.ReturnCode 
      static interface  CarWatchdogManager.StatsPeriod 
      static interface  CarWatchdogManager.TimeoutLengthEnum

      • TIMEOUT_CRITICAL

        public static final int TIMEOUT_CRITICAL
        Timeout for services which should be responsive. The length is 3,000 milliseconds.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • TIMEOUT_MODERATE

        public static final int TIMEOUT_MODERATE
        Timeout for services which are relatively responsive. The length is 5,000 milliseconds.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • TIMEOUT_NORMAL

        public static final int TIMEOUT_NORMAL
        Timeout for all other services. The length is 10,000 milliseconds.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 方法详细资料

      • registerClient

        public void registerClient(java.util.concurrent.Executor executor,
                           CarWatchdogManager.CarWatchdogClientCallback client,
                           int timeout)
        Registers the car watchdog clients to CarWatchdogManager.

        It is allowed to register a client from any thread, but only one client can be registered. If two or more clients are needed, create a new Car and register a client to it.

        参数:
        client - Watchdog client implementing CarWatchdogManager.CarWatchdogClientCallback interface.
        timeout - The time duration within which the client desires to respond. The actual timeout is decided by watchdog server.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if at least one client is already registered.

      • unregisterClient

        public void unregisterClient(CarWatchdogManager.CarWatchdogClientCallback client)
        Unregisters the car watchdog client from CarWatchdogManager.
        参数:
        client - Watchdog client implementing CarWatchdogManager.CarWatchdogClientCallback interface.

      • tellClientAlive

        public void tellClientAlive(CarWatchdogManager.CarWatchdogClientCallback client,
                            int sessionId)
        Tells CarWatchdogManager that the client is alive.
        参数:
        client - Watchdog client implementing CarWatchdogManager.CarWatchdogClientCallback interface.
        sessionId - Session id given by CarWatchdogManager.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if client is not registered.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if sessionId is not correct.

      • getResourceOveruseStats

        public ResourceOveruseStats getResourceOveruseStats(int resourceOveruseFlag,
                                                    int maxStatsPeriod)
        Returns resource overuse stats for the calling package. Returns null, if no stats.
        参数:
        resourceOveruseFlag - Flag to indicate the types of resource overuse stats to return.
        maxStatsPeriod - Maximum period to aggregate the resource overuse stats.
        返回:
        Resource overuse stats for the calling package. If the calling package has no stats for a specified resource overuse type, null value is returned for the corresponding resource overuse stats. If the calling package doesn't have sufficient stats for maxStatsPeriod for a specified resource overuse type, the stats are returned only for the period returned in the individual resource overuse stats.

      • getAllResourceOveruseStats

        public java.util.List<ResourceOveruseStats> getAllResourceOveruseStats(int resourceOveruseFlag,
                                                                       int minimumStatsFlag,
                                                                       int maxStatsPeriod)
        Returns resource overuse stats for all monitored packages.
        参数:
        resourceOveruseFlag - Flag to indicate the types of resource overuse stats to return.
        minimumStatsFlag - Flag to specify the minimum stats for each resource overuse type. Only stats above the specified minimum stats for a resource overuse type will be returned. May provide only one minimum stats flag for each resource overuse type. When no minimum stats flag is specified, all stats are returned.
        maxStatsPeriod - Maximum period to aggregate the resource overuse stats.
        返回:
        Resource overuse stats for all monitored packages. If any package doesn't have stats for a specified resource type, null value is returned for the corresponding resource overuse stats. If any package doesn't have sufficient stats for maxStatsPeriod for a specified resource overuse type, the stats are returned only for the period returned in the individual resource stats.

      • getResourceOveruseStatsForUserPackage

        public ResourceOveruseStats getResourceOveruseStatsForUserPackage(java.lang.String packageName,
                                                                  UserHandle userHandle,
                                                                  int resourceOveruseFlag,
                                                                  int maxStatsPeriod)
        Returns resource overuse stats for a specific user package.
        参数:
        packageName - Name of the package whose stats should be returned.
        userHandle - Handle of the user whose stats should be returned.
        resourceOveruseFlag - Flag to indicate the types of resource overuse stats to return.
        maxStatsPeriod - Maximum period to aggregate the resource overuse stats.
        返回:
        Resource overuse stats for the specified user package. If the user package has no stats for a specified resource overuse type, null value is returned for the corresponding resource overuse stats. If the user package doesn't have sufficient stats for maxStatsPeriod for a specified resource overuse type, the stats are returned only for the period returned in the individual resource overuse stats.

      • addResourceOveruseListener

        public void addResourceOveruseListener(java.util.concurrent.Executor executor,
                                       int resourceOveruseFlag,
                                       CarWatchdogManager.ResourceOveruseListener listener)
        Adds the CarWatchdogManager.ResourceOveruseListener for the calling package.

        Resource overuse notifications are sent only for the calling package's resource overuse.

        参数:
        listener - Listener implementing CarWatchdogManager.ResourceOveruseListener interface.
        resourceOveruseFlag - Flag to indicate the types of resource overuses to listen.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if (@code listener} is already added.

      • removeResourceOveruseListener

        public void removeResourceOveruseListener(CarWatchdogManager.ResourceOveruseListener listener)
        Removes the CarWatchdogManager.ResourceOveruseListener for the calling package.
        参数:
        listener - Listener implementing CarWatchdogManager.ResourceOveruseListener interface.

      • addResourceOveruseListenerForSystem

        public void addResourceOveruseListenerForSystem(java.util.concurrent.Executor executor,
                                                int resourceOveruseFlag,
                                                CarWatchdogManager.ResourceOveruseListener listener)
        Adds CarWatchdogManager.ResourceOveruseListener to get resource overuse notifications for all packages.

        Listening system services will get notified on any package overusing one of the resources specified at resourceOveruseFlag.

        参数:
        listener - Listener implementing CarWatchdogManager.ResourceOveruseListener interface.
        resourceOveruseFlag - Flag to indicate the types of resource overuses to listen.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if (@code listener} is already added.

      • removeResourceOveruseListenerForSystem

        public void removeResourceOveruseListenerForSystem(CarWatchdogManager.ResourceOveruseListener listener)
        Removes CarWatchdogManager.ResourceOveruseListener from receiving system resource overuse notifications.
        参数:
        listener - Listener implementing CarWatchdogManager.ResourceOveruseListener interface.

      • setKillablePackageAsUser

        public void setKillablePackageAsUser(java.lang.String packageName,
                                     UserHandle userHandle,
                                     boolean isKillable)
        Sets whether or not a package is killable on resource overuse.

        Updating killable setting for package, whose state cannot be changed, will result in exception. This API may be used by CarSettings application or UI notification.

        参数:
        packageName - Name of the package whose setting should to be updated. Note: All packages under shared UID share the killable state as well. Thus setting the killable state for one package will set the killable state for all other packages that share a UID.
        userHandle - User whose setting should be updated.
        isKillable - Whether or not the package for the specified user is killable on resource overuse.

      • getPackageKillableStatesAsUser

        public java.util.List<PackageKillableState> getPackageKillableStatesAsUser(UserHandle userHandle)
        Returns the list of package killable states on resource overuse for the user.

        This API may be used by CarSettings application or UI notification.

        参数:
        userHandle - User whose killable states for all packages should be returned.

      • setResourceOveruseConfigurations

        public int setResourceOveruseConfigurations(java.util.List<ResourceOveruseConfiguration> configurations,
                                            int resourceOveruseFlag)
        Sets the resource overuse configurations for the components provided in the configurations.

        Must provide only one configuration per component. System services should set the configurations only for system and third-party components. Vendor services should set the configuration only for the vendor component.

        参数:
        configurations - List of resource overuse configurations. One configuration per component.
        resourceOveruseFlag - Flag to indicate the types of resource overuse configurations to set.
        返回:
        - RETURN_CODE_SUCCESS if the set request is successful. - RETURN_CODE_ERROR if the set request cannot be completed and the client should retry later.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if configurations are invalid.

      • getResourceOveruseConfigurations

        public java.util.List<ResourceOveruseConfiguration> getResourceOveruseConfigurations(int resourceOveruseFlag)
        Returns the current resource overuse configurations for all components.

        This call is blocking and may take few seconds to return if the service is temporarily unavailable.

        参数:
        resourceOveruseFlag - Flag to indicate the types of resource overuse configurations to return.
        返回:
        If the server process is alive and connected, returns list of available resource overuse configurations for all components. If the server process is dead, returns null value.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the system is in an invalid state.

      • onCarDisconnected

        public void onCarDisconnected()
        从类复制的说明: CarManagerBase
        Handle disconnection of car service (=crash). As car service has crashed already, this call should only clean up any listeners / callbacks passed from client. Clearing object passed to car service is not necessary as car service has crashed. Note that Car*Manager will not work any more as all binders are invalid. Client should re-create all Car*Managers when car service is restarted.
        指定者:
        onCarDisconnected 在类中 CarManagerBase
